What fast fashion and high-end brands categorize as XS to

XL in hip sizes

Each brand’s range of hip sizes in inches from extra small (XS) to extra

large (XL).

American Eagle had the smallest

small (S) hip size starting at

32 inches. High-end brand AMO

had the largest small (S)

hip size at 37 inches.

50

40

45

35

CleanPNG and pnegg provided the logos.

Source: Web scrapping by Ananya Chetia
